description: Number of nonsingular n X n matrices over GF(3).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..45
J. Overbey, W. Traves and J. Wojdylo, On the Keyspace of the Hill Cipher.
formula: a(n) = Product_{k=0..n-1}(3^n-3^k). - corrected by _Michel Marcus_, Sep 18 2015a(n) = A047656(n)*A027871(n). [_Bruno Berselli_, Jan 30 2013]
prog: (MAGMA) [1] cat [&*[(3^n - 3^k): k in [0..n-1]]: n in [1..9]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Jan 28 2013
author: Stephen G. Penrice (spenrice(AT)ets.org), Mar 04 2000
extensions: Edited Mathematica code by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 28 2013
